OOC: Agreed to all. I say, all who are in favor of the poll being deleted, =
e-mail a moderator and say so...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: r=
obertdahl 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 28, 2001 2:=
49 AM
  Subject: Re: New poll for nbwrpg


  Okay guys, first of all, I am =
partly in agreement with LN about this
  poll. It is an inane poll, and I w=
ouldnt even vote on it to see the
  results. First of all, it is demeaning =
to whoever may lose even though
  it means Jack SHIT. The truth of the matt=
er is that the poll you created
  is a relative question. RPGing is the sam=
e thing as anything else, "to
  each his own". Some people will like my lon=
g discriptive posts, while
  others will find it boring and a waste of time=
. Others will like posts
  that are short and sweet, to the point, while th=
e rest will feel they
  have no substance. It really dosent matter. Also, t=
his rpg is only as
  good as it's worse player, so we are all affected by a=
 bad post,
  therefor should all be striving to get better. Tankor, please =
stop
  making these dumb polls, somebodies feelings might get hurt if peopl=
e
  actually vote, and I find it mosly insulting that you would even waste
=
  your time to write the stupid thing, which serves no purpose but to
  bel=
ittle others.


   

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.=
yahoo.com/info/terms/
